We are excited about the diverse analyses included in the compiled Shale Network database and are delighted by your interest in participating. We warmly welcome anyone passionate about energy-water interactions and eager to investigate questions related to the impacts of hydrocarbon extraction within a collaborative group setting to join the project.

If you would like to submit a database or begin working with us, please fill out the quick data volunteer form.
